CustomField.formula: IF( Is_From_LMS__c == TRUE || $Permission.Opportunity_Edit_Loan == FALSE || ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Consent__c, "Setuju") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Status__c, "Canceled") || IsLocked__c == TRUE, "", HYPERLINK("/lightning/action/quick/Opportunity.Pop_Edit_Loan?objectApiName&context=RECORD_DETAIL&recordId="& CASESAFEID(Id)&"&backgroundContext=%2Flightning%2Fr%2FAccount%2F"&CASESAFEID(AccountId)&"%2Fview", "Ubah" , '_self'))
CustomField.label: Action
